General.Name: Higgstec
General.Description: Higgstec Inc. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, sale, and service of various touch solutions. The company offers standard and custom 5-wire resistive touch panel and screen solutions, projected capacitive touch solutions, 5-wire resistive touch and PCAP controllers, and 5-wire resistive touch controllers and panels. Its products and solutions are used in IPC and business, military, automotive, medical, marine, and gaming applications. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Yilan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 22, Dingping Road, Yilan City, Taiwan, 270008
